title: Fire Screen, ca. 1860
medium:
Embroidered in wool on a linen foundation
Medium: wool embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and pile loop stitches; plain weave canvas
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 79.1 x 59.1 cm (31 1/8 x 23 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Edgar S. Auchincloss
description: Panel from a firescreen with embroidery in raised Berlin-work.  A large urn with flowers and fruits worked in many colors, with a small red-breasted bird to the right and a large white cockatoo on the left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fire Screen, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Embroidered in wool on a linen foundation
Medium: wool embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and pile loop stitches; plain weave canvas. Gift of Mrs. Edgar S. Auchincloss. 1947-34-1.
